publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1092 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion-That the Parliament agrees that for Stage 3 of the Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill and the National Parks (Scotland) Bill, debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion at the following times (calculated from the time when Stage 3 of the Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill begins) - Bail, Judicial Appointments etc. (Scotland) Bill Group 1 to Group 4 - no later than 1 hour 15 minutes Group 5 - no later than 1 hour 45 minutes Group 6 to Group 10 - no later than 3 hours Motion to pass the Bill - no later than 3 hours 30 minutes National Parks (Scotland) Bill Group 1 to Group 4 - no later than 4 hours 30 minutes Group 5 - no later than 5 hours 15 minutes Group 6 to Group 7 - no later than 6 hours Group 8 to Group 11 - no later than 7 hours Motion to pass the bill - no later than 7 hours 30 minutes. Supported by: Iain Smith*
